text: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَـٰهٌ وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَـٰهٌ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Dialah Tuhan (Yang disembah) di langit dan Tuhan (Yang disembah) di bumi dan Dialah Yang Maha Bijaksana lagi Maha Mengetahui.
